duties_responsibilities.duty: Monitor and manage support case queues within ServiceNow.
Perform troubleshooting on Pax8 Platform defined issues.
Assist in the transfer of customers between Pax8 Partners.
Facilitate communication between Pax8 Partners and Sales when necessary.
Document processes and generate knowledge base articles to establish troubleshooting best practices.
Receive and make calls, and conduct screen share sessions with Pax8 Partners.

education_certification.credential: HS diploma/GED; or equivalent work experience, ITIL Certification preferred
